description: Learn how to make chocolate cake that has a subtle coconut flavour and is smothered in rich dark chocolate ganache. This chocolate cake is truly irresistible.
keywords: Chocolate Coconut Cake With Dark Chocolate Ganache
name: Chocolate Coconut Cake With Dark Chocolate Ganache Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut cake in half horizontally to form two layers. Spread a little of the ganache over bottom layer. Replace cake top, then spread top and sides of cake with remaining ganache. Serve sprinkled with extra coconut.
